targets.query:
import "date"

items = [
  "grid_delivery",
  "consumer_used_battery_production",
  "consumer_used_pv_production",
]

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: items))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      "Grid delivery": r.grid_delivery,
      "Battery used": r.consumer_used_battery_production,
      "Direct used": r.consumer_used_pv_production
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg})}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Grid delivery", "Battery used", "Direct used"])

import "date"

items = [
  "grid_delivery",
  "grid_consumption",
  "consumer_used_battery_production",
  "consumer_used_pv_production",
  "inverter_consumption"
]

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: items))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      "Inverter": r.inverter_consumption,
      "Direct": r.consumer_used_pv_production,
      "Battery": r.consumer_used_battery_production,
      "Grid": r.grid_consumption - r.inverter_consumption,
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg})}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Grid", "Direct", "Battery", "Inverter"])

import "date"
import "math"

items = [
  "grid_delivery",
  "consumer_used_battery_production",
  "inverter_production",
  ]

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: items))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      "Grid delivery":
        math.round(x: r.grid_delivery / r.inverter_production * 100.0),
      "Battery used":
        math.round(x: r.consumer_used_battery_production / r.inverter_production * 100.0)
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "Direct used": 
    if 100.0 - r["Grid delivery"] - r["Battery used"] < 0 then
      0.0
    else
      100.0 - r["Grid delivery"] - r["Battery used"]}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg})}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Battery used", "Grid delivery", "Direct used"])

import "date"
import "math"

items = [
  "grid_consumption",
  "consumer_used_pv_production",
  "consumer_used_battery_production",
  "consumer_total",
]

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: items))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      "Grid": 
        if r.consumer_total > 0.0  then
          math.round(x: (r.grid_consumption / r.consumer_total * 100.0))
        else
          0.0,
      "Battery":
          math.round(x: (r.consumer_used_battery_production / r.consumer_total * 100.0))
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "Direct": 
    if 100.0 - r.Grid - r.Battery < 0 then
      0.0
    else
      100.0 - r.Grid - r.Battery}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg})}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Grid", "Direct", "Battery"])

import "date"

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_production")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg}), _value: if exists r._value then r._value else 0.0}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Production")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field" "_value"])

import "date"
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "forecast")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energy")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg})}))

import "date"

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "powerflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_production")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.agg_type == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg})}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Power")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field" "_value"])

import "date"
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "forecast")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg}), _value: if exists r._value then r._value else 0.0}))

import "date"

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grid_consumption" or r["_field"] == "grid_delivery" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg})}))
  |> map(fn: (r)=>({r with _field: if r._field == "grid_consumption" then "Consumption" else "Delivery"}))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "date"
import "timezone"

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state_of_charge")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.agg_type == "mean")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time), unit: ${agg})}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "SoC")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field" "_value"])

import "date"

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grid_consumption" or r["_field"] == "grid_delivery")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with hour: date.hour(t: r._time)}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "hour"], mode: "by")
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _name: if r.hour < 10 then "0" + string(v: r.hour) else string(v: r.hour)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: if r._field == "grid_consumption" then "Consumption" else "Delivery" }))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_name"], columnKey:["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "date"

weekdays = ["Montag", "Dienstag", "Mittwoch", "Donnerstag", "Freitag", "Samstag", "Sonntag"]

from(bucket: "${sebucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grid_consumption" or r["_field"] == "grid_delivery")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 1s, from: r._time)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with weekday: date.weekDay(t: r._time)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with weekday: if r.weekday == 0 then 7 else r.weekday}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "weekday"])
  |> mean()
  |> sort(columns: ["weekday"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _name: weekdays[r.weekday - 1]}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: if r._field == "grid_consumption" then "Consumption" else "Delivery" }))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_name"], columnKey:["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
